title: Broken Halo
description: Audrielle Rilee is an twenty-one year old upcoming fashion designer major at the The Art Institute of Seattle, Washington. Her life is a major disaster, dealing with substance abuse and surviving a sexual assault when she was a teenager. Her life changed on a monday when she ran into the hottest and popular bad boy on campus Jaxson Evans, who happens to be the lead singer of the best underground band of all times "Broken Halo".Not only is Audrielle flirting and trying to get with Jaxson Evans. She starts a fling wih her professor Clay Ryan who is over protective and controlling and wants nothing more than Audrielle in his bed, begging for more. Who will she choose, the bad boy who can sing his way to her heart or her hot young professor who wants nothing more than to bend her over and fuck her every position the kama sutura knows how.
author: Brit N. Lane
